name: Lady Midday
description:
You've been voluntold to go back into the office. Problem is Lady Midday is there. Your energy will drain slowly just by being in the same space, but if she catches you, she will stay near you to try and drain you to death.

Use your arrow keys to navigate the office and find the five items your colleagues need. Then you'll have to find the exit to get out alive.

Credits

Music
